pageContext.claim: “Worst Polls, just like in 2016 when they were so far off the mark, are the @FoxNews Polls. Why doesn't Fox finally get a competent Polling Company?”
pageContext.analysis: Fox News earns an A- in FiveThirtyEight pollster rankings, one of the top marks. Trump's favorite pollster, Rasmussen, earns only a C+.
